title: Number of Fatal Injuries at the Pula Steel Factory
summary: This chart shows the Number of Fatal Injuries at the Fatal Injuries Pula Steel Factory over a 4 Year period , between 2012 and 2016 .
\\n From the chart we can see that in the Year 2012 , there were 27 Fatal Injuries at the Fatal Injuries Pula Steel Factory .
This increased in 2013 to 32 Fatal Injuries .
gold: We can see from the chart the fatal injuries sustained at the Pula Steel Factory between 2012 and 2016 . The number of fatalities grew from 27 in 2012 to 32 in 2013 . Thereafter , there has been a decline over the years down to 22 in 2015 .
